name: Jeff Wick
description:
Here it is folks! My first somewhat legitimate game. This project took me about a month, and my sanity. I am so happy that im finally done with this. Anyways, I present to you, Jeff Wick.

description / spoilor / plot / lore:

In this game, you play as a killer assassin named Jeff Wick driven by a voice in your dream. You fight and defeat various bosses only to gain enough consciousness for you to hear chatters around you and realize that this whole you being a badass in your dream is not just a dream...

instructions:

in game but if you want to know it now, move to move (AWSD or arrow keys), E to go to next level, R to restart level, F to go back to menu, and Left click to fire, and right click to use grapple gun (only within range).

credits: 

everything by me except for the musics, they are by Daniel delux from Ghost Runner(plz no sue).

the whole sound track is here:

Unity Engine if you couldn't tell

Unity for the art thats right I didn't use any art assest i built everything with Unity's defualt squares and circles.

a lot of cringe

by the way, there are still bugs here and there and if u accidently do one... just restart and dont do it next time ;)
